name: 10 January 2018 HWC London meeting
content:
Meeting details
    10 January 2018 HWC London meeting
    
      
      
        Wednesday 10 January 2018 at  6:30pm
      
      —
      
         8:30pm.
      
    
    
    
  
    
    hub by Premier Inn London Covent Garden,
    110 St Martin's Lane,
    London
    WC2N 4BA.
  


    
  
  #hwclondon

  #indieweb



  

  
  
    
  
  

  
    
      
      RSVPs
      JavaScript must be enabled to retrieve and display RSVPs.

      
        
        
          
            
            
              
              
            
          
        
        
      

      
  
  Register
  
  
    

    Join us anytime from 18:00 onwards at Proven Dough cafe below Hub by Premier Inn hotel in Covent Garden. The main event starts at 18:30 with a writing hour followed by discussion, show and tell. Look out for Calum Ryan the organiser usually wearing an IndieWeb t-shirt and stickered laptop.
There are a few different ways you can register for Homebrew Website Club London:

    
      
Indie RSVPAble to send via Webmentions? then RSVP your attendance to the next event.
Webmention target for next event: https://hwclondon.co.uk/meetups/20180110

      IndieWeb.orgIf you're able to use your own domain name to sign in to websites including IndieWeb.org then add yourself to the next London event listed there.
      
      
        
          EventbriteNew to IndieWeb? simply register you're attending on the Eventbrite page.
        
        
          
            Powered by Eventbrite
